title: How It Works
subtitle: Simple steps to get your car serviced
description: Getting professional car service has never been easier. Follow these simple steps to book and receive quality automotive care.

steps.title: Book Service
steps.description: Choose your service type and schedule an appointment online or by phone

steps.title: Vehicle Pickup
steps.description: Our team picks up your vehicle from your location at the scheduled time

steps.title: Professional Service
steps.description: Certified technicians perform the service using quality parts and tools

steps.title: Quality Check
steps.description: Thorough inspection and testing to ensure everything meets our standards

steps.title: Vehicle Return
steps.description: Your serviced vehicle is delivered back to your location, ready to go

items.title: Convenient Pickup & Delivery
items.description: No need to visit workshops - we come to you

items.title: Transparent Updates
items.description: Real-time updates throughout the service process

items.title: Quality Guarantee
items.description: All work comes with our comprehensive warranty

items.title: Verified Workshops
items.description: Only certified and trusted service providers

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Book your service today and experience the convenience

metadata.title: How It Works - El7a2ny
metadata.description: Learn how El7a2ny's simple 5-step process makes car servicing convenient with pickup, professional service, and delivery.
